title: Bell Lap
description: A coming-of-age tale of self-discovery and unrealized dreams, Bell Lap is the story of Tom Cola, a young runner chasing athletic greatness while trying to find himself in the process. Coping with the death of his best friend, the loss of his fianc√©e, and ultimately the end of his running career, Tom searches for answers and struggles to find meaning in his life.
author: Tom Cola
